property.value: Response: After a SERPENT character leaves play, put any number of SERPENT characters into play from your discard pile.

property.value: Disrupt: When you draw Dr. Laban Shrewsbury, if you control at least 1 { card, reveal him to your opponent and shuffle him into your deck. Then, choose and shuffle 1 VILLAINOUS character into its owner's deck or draw 1 card. (Limit 1 per turn.)

Until the end of the phase that character gains or loses 1 $ icon. Then the chosen story gains or loses 1 $ struggle until the end of the phase.
